name: Forget Mesa ( Half Life Multiplayer Remake in Unity3D )
name_original: Forget Mesa ( Half Life Multiplayer Remake in Unity3D )
description:
Half-Life is being developed again with Unity 3D

now a new era begins for half life fans. new physics system, upgraded graphics, weapon customizations, new weapons, new platforms, brand new gameplay.

So what's in the new game?

new physics system,

new graphics,

first-person and third-person sysem,

advanced artificial intelligence,

new weapons,

new characters,

weapon customization,

weapon skins,

new maps (most popular maps in other games),

game modes, deathmatch, team deathmatch, gunplay, zombie mode and bomb defuse(to be added soon).

As an indie game developer and half life fan, i think you will help me improve the game by sending me your feedback, criticism and suggestions.

Thanks everyone in advance.
